attributes.action: Invest more money in UK census reports in order to crack down on immagrants who are draining public services without paying tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tonight’s panorama reported on the problem in Slough of illegal migrants draining public services of funds while paying no tax. An estimated £5 million has been lost in Slough alone, who knows how much has been lost UK wide? Why should the law abiding, tax paying citizens pay for these blood sucking low life’s to live in our beautiful country??
